name: The Great Barrier Reef
description: The world's largest coral reef system, teeming with vibrant marine life and diverse ecosystems.

name: The Taj Mahal
description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum in India, known for its intricate architecture and poignant love story.

name: The Northern Lights
description: A mesmerizing natural light display in the high-latitude regions, caused by charged particles interacting with Earth's atmosphere.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An ancient Inca city nestled high in the Peruvian Andes, shrouded in mystery and breathtaking mountain views.

name: The Amazon Rainforest
description: The world's largest rainforest, home to staggering biodiversity and crucial to global climate regulation.
